code: import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectCard=_ref=>{let{project,sno}=_ref;const{imgSrc,title,description,url}=project;const isEven=sno%2===0;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`project-content ${isEven?"even":"odd"}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`project-img ${isEven?"even":"odd"}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imgSrc,alt:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`project-description ${isEven?"even":"odd"}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"btn-link btn-outline btn",children:"View Project"})]})]});};export default ProjectCard;
